Welcome to Telegram_bot’s documentation!¶

Telegram_bot bot¶

async bot.command_start_handler(message: Message)¶

The command_start_handler function is the handler for the /start command. It sends a welcome message to the user who sent it.

Parameters:

message – Message: Get the message object, which contains all the information about that message

Returns:

The message &quot;hello, {user_fullname}&quot;

Doc-author:

Trelent

async bot.main() → None¶

The main function of the bot.

Returns:

None, so we need to explicitly tell the type checker that it’s ok

Doc-author:

Trelent

async bot.remind_git(message: Message)¶
The remind_git function is a coroutine that sends a message to the user

reminding them to commit their code.

Parameters:

message – Message: Get the message object

Returns:

A message with the user’s name and a reminder to commit changes

Doc-author:

Trelent
